name: Clicker Survival
description:
Click on the red ball to earn points and buy upgrades to earn more points and help you survive. Avoid the enemies which will take your points if your hit. The blue ovals, or "portals", are where the enemies spawn, maybe stay away from those. 

escape to toggle pause

There are three enemies, a enemy which chases the player, one that shoots the player, and one that turns the player missiles into enemies.

If an upgrade menu doesn't go away when you move your mouse away, just put your mouse over it to get rid of it. Sadly there are no sounds, but I plan to add sound, along with some more enemies and some better balancing later on.
